Paragraph: Ionizing radiation is capable of inducing the requisite CML - associated t ( 9 : 22 ) translocation ( Philadelphia chromosome ) in appropriate cells in vitro but , thus far , chemicals have not shown this capacity .

| --- |

Explanation:

* CML stands for Chronic Myeloid Leukemia, which is a type of cancer. It is mentioned in the paragraph as "CML - associated t ( 9 : 22 ) translocation ( Philadelphia chromosome )". I have identified CML as a disease entity in the table.
